name: SLEEPOVER
detailed_description:
In SLEEPOVER, you're either the Slasher or the Vet. The Slasher is loud, wearing boots and equipped with a Knife. The Slasher doesn't play nice and is someone you should avoid as the Vet. The Vet is quiet, wearing socks and pajamas equipped with nothing but their bare hands. Don't underestimate the Vet though. If the Vet sneaks up on the Slasher, it's lights out...

The Slasher has a knife though so be careful if you're the Vet. You can try and use the Lightswitches to make a room light or dark. Try and hide behind furniture or jump out a window. The Vet's house is small, but has many entrances.

SLASHER
*Loud
*Has a Knife
*Dark Clothes
*Bright Mask

VET
*Quiet
*Does not have a Knife
*Can Choke-hold from behind though


[Experimental / Legacy Content]

Multiplayer Free-For-All, Coop and Team Deathmatch modes featuring AI enemies.

New Coop Mode! Attempt Coop missions with friends or solo, solve puzzles to progress while fending off AI enemies.
